thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 13 of 517
thread.title: SANDRA OSBORNE

author: SANDRA OSBORNE
title: SANDRA OSBORNE
text: I spoke to a very competent and helpful representative when sorting out a wrong prescription at my end. Unfortunately, I was not able to return the contacts because I had written an L and an R on the outside of the packaging. My loss. Given that I reordered new lenses right away it would have been nice if the representative would have had the authorization to offer me a discount in good faith. Even a 10% discount would have made me feel better. Anyway, the customer service is very good and the web site slightly confusing but I got through it.
